Text: ASME Membershippst Dear RICHARD Make a New Years Resolution help an ASME Student Member Recruit a new member and of the First Year Dues will be spent on Scholarships ASME membership offers professional personal development through NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES LATEST TECHNICAL INFORMATION CAREER SERVICES CONTINUING EDUCATION INSTITUTE Up to DISCOUNTS ON PUBLICATIONS VALUEADDED PROGRAMS Home Auto Insurances Career Fairs Professional Liability Insurances etc AND MORE Heres how to participate Print your name and membership number on the Sponsors Name line of the attached application Make copies Discuss the benefits of joining ASME and distribute membership applications to your colleagues For additional applications call THEASME outside North America call or access the downloadable application at pdfmemberexpresapnmmepdf Follow up with new members that you recruited to welcome them to ASME Visit membershipdrive for complete campaign details HAPPY NEW YEAR Cheryl Hasan Coordinator Member Recruitment You are currently subscribed to ASMEs mgam list as To change your personal information or email address please click on the link below memberaddrhtmlsecurityhtm To unsubscribe send a blank email to
